content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: dark_oak_boat
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 5, "index": 12}, {"type": "light_blue_concrete", "quantity": 58, "index": 22}, {"type": "prismarine_stairs", "quantity": 51, "index": 34}, {"type": "smooth_sandstone", "quantity": 58, "index": 36}, {"type": "polished_diorite_slab", "quantity": 27, "index": 37}]
thought: To craft a dark_oak_boat, I need to place dark_oak_planks in slots 1, 3, 5, 6, 7, 9. The first dark_oak_planks is currently located at slot 12, so I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: dark_oak_boat
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "light_blue_concrete", "quantity": 58, "index": 22}, {"type": "prismarine_stairs", "quantity": 51, "index": 34}, {"type": "smooth_sandstone", "quantity": 58, "index": 36}, {"type": "polished_diorite_slab", "quantity": 27, "index": 37}]
thought: Now that I have placed the dark_oak_planks in slot 1, I need to place another in slot 3. The next dark_oak_planks is still in slot 12, so I will move it there.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 3 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 4 with quantity 1
